<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <record_update table="v_plugin"> <v_plugin action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>active</active> <available_version>1.0.1</available_version> <definition><![CDATA[<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <plugin id="com.glide.notification" name="Subscription Based Notifications" state="published" help="Subscription_Based_Notifications_Plugin" provider_name="ServiceNow" version="1.0.1" licensable="true">
<description> Advanced notification components </description>
<requires> <import plugin="com.glide.ui_policy"/> <import plugin="com.glide.email_notification_preview" /> </requires>
<extension point="COM_GLIDE_NOTIFICATION" name="gauge" class="com.glide.report.gauge" /> <extension point="COM_GLIDE_NOTIFICATION" name="reportID" class="com.glide.notification.substitution.EmailReportGenerator" /> <extension point="COM_GLIDE_NOTIFICATION" name="gaugeID" class="com.glide.notification.substitution.EmailChartGenerator" /> <extension point="COM_GLIDE_NOTIFICATION" name="dashboardID" class="com.glide.notification.substitution.EmailDashBoardGenerator" /> <extension point="COM_GLIDE_NOTIFICATION" name="chartID" class="com.glide.notification.substitution.EmailCustomChartGenerator" /> <extension point="com.glide.xmlstats.extender" name="notification" class="com.glide.notification.stats.XMLStatsNotification" />
</plugin> ]]></definition> <description>Advanced notification components</description> <has_demo_data>false</has_demo_data> <help>http://docs.servicenow.com/?context=Subscription_Based_Notifications_Plugin</help> <id>com.glide.notification</id> <licensable>true</licensable> <name>Subscription Based Notifications</name> <path>plugin://com.glide.notification/</path> <provider>ServiceNow</provider> <requires>com.glide.ui_policy,com.glide.email_notification_preview</requires> <scope>global</scope> <state>published</state> <supports_rollback>false</supports_rollback> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2017-12-05 06:05:21</sys_created_on> <sys_id>com.glide.notification</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2017-12-05 06:05:21</sys_updated_on> <trackable>true</trackable> <type/> <version>1.0.1</version> </v_plugin> </record_update>
